statements: SELECT * FROM transportation_schedule WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT vehicle_type, carbon_emissions FROM transportation_schedule WHERE carbon_emissions > 100;
SELECT schedule_id, departure_time, arrival_time FROM transportation_schedule WHERE vehicle_type = 'Bus' ORDER BY departure_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM transportation_schedule WHERE carbon_emissions BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY schedule_id ASC;
SELECT route_id, arrival_time FROM transportation_schedule WHERE departure_time > '2022-01-01 12:00:00' AND departure_time < '2022-01-02 12:00:00';
SELECT * FROM transportation_schedule ORDER BY departure_time DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT schedule_id, route_id, departure_time, vehicle_type FROM transportation_schedule WHERE carbon_emissions > 100 ORDER BY carbon_emissions ASC
SELECT schedule_id, route_id, arrival_time, carbon_emissions FROM transportation_schedule WHERE vehicle_type = 'Bus' AND carbon_emissions < 50
SELECT route_id, departure_time, arrival_time FROM transportation_schedule WHERE route_id IN (101, 102, 103) ORDER BY arrival_time ASC
SELECT schedule_id, vehicle_type, carbon_emissions FROM transportation_schedule WHERE departure_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-12-31 23:59:59'
SELECT * FROM transportation_schedule;
SELECT schedule_id, bus_line, departure_time, arrival_time FROM transportation_schedule;
SELECT bus_line, arrival_time, departure_time, schedule_id FROM transportation_schedule;
SELECT route_id, route_name, route_details FROM transportation_routes;
SELECT * FROM transportation_routes;
SELECT * FROM transportation_schedule WHERE bus_line = 'Bus A'
SELECT schedule_id, departure_time FROM transportation_schedule WHERE arrival_time > '2023-08-15 10:00:00'
SELECT bus_line, arrival_time FROM transportation_schedule WHERE departure_time < '2023-08-20 12:00:00' ORDER BY arrival_time DESC
SELECT * FROM transportation_routes WHERE route_distance > 100 ORDER BY route_distance ASC
SELECT route_name, route_details FROM transportation_routes WHERE route_id = 3
SELECT * FROM schedules LIMIT 5;
SELECT route_id, departure_time, arrival_time FROM schedules WHERE schedule_id = 3;
SELECT schedule_id, route_id, arrival_time FROM schedules WHERE departure_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT route_name, distance_km FROM routes WHERE vehicle_type = 'Bus';
SELECT stop_id, stop_name, route_id, stop_order FROM stops ORDER BY stop_order DESC;
SELECT * FROM stops WHERE route_id = 1 ORDER BY stop_order DESC;
SELECT route_id, route_name, vehicle_type, distance_km FROM routes WHERE distance_km > 100 ORDER BY distance_km ASC;
SELECT schedule_id, route_id, departure_time, arrival_time FROM schedules WHERE departure_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT route_id, stop_name, stop_order FROM stops JOIN routes ON stops.route_id = routes.route_id WHERE route_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY stop_order ASC;
SELECT * FROM schedules JOIN routes ON schedules.route_id = routes.route_id WHERE vehicle_type = 'Bus';
SELECT * FROM Schedule WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT station_name, location FROM Station WHERE station_id = 2;
SELECT route_name, carbon_emissions FROM Route WHERE distance_km > 100;
SELECT departure_time, arrival_time FROM Schedule WHERE schedule_id = 5;
SELECT station_from_id, station_to_id FROM Connection WHERE route_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Schedule ORDER BY departure_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT route_name, distance_km FROM Route WHERE carbon_emissions > 20;
SELECT station_name, location FROM Station WHERE station_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT Schedule.*, Route.route_name FROM Schedule JOIN Route ON Schedule.route_id = Route.route_id;
SELECT station_from_id, station_to_id, travel_time_minutes FROM Connection ORDER BY travel_time_minutes ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM routes;
SELECT route_name, route_distance FROM routes ORDER BY route_distance DESC;
SELECT station_name, location_point FROM stations WHERE station_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM schedules WHERE departure_time BETWEEN '08:00:00' AND '10:00:00';
SELECT trip_id, route_id, vehicle_id FROM trips ORDER BY trip_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM routes ORDER BY route_id DESC;
SELECT route_name, route_distance FROM routes WHERE route_distance > 1000;
SELECT stations.station_id, stations.station_name, routes.route_name FROM stations INNER JOIN routes ON stations.station_id = routes.route_id;
SELECT AVG(capacity) AS avg_capacity, COUNT(vehicle_id) AS total_vehicles FROM vehicles GROUP BY vehicle_type;

SELECT trips.trip_id, schedules.departure_time, schedules.arrival_time, vehicles.vehicle_type FROM trips JOIN schedules ON trips.schedule_id = schedules.schedule_id JOIN vehicles ON trips.vehicle_id = vehicles.vehicle_id WHERE schedules.arrival_time > '12:00:00';
